name: The Last Soup
description:
Good ol' World War III has begun and nukes are falling faster than my self esteem. Help your friendly-neighborhood-nuclear-fallout-survivor out by getting his some nutritious and delicious cans of Tomato Soup! Who knows maybe he won't die :D 

Made for the Paint Jam 2021

Notes:

The only thing you need is a mouse and a finger to play this game. (Only control is Left-Click).

If you can't find the Play button in the main menu its on the sad and empty soup shelf.

The goal is to get as many cans as you can within 60 seconds. Losing 3 times will cause the game to end.

Some extra explanation on the mini-games

Alligator: If the can drops in the water then alligators will eat it, keep it up in the air by clicking on it.

Arms: Some pesky shoppers are trying to take the last can in the soup store, teach em a lesson by cutting their arms in halve, by clicking on the X on their elbow area.

Basket: Your at a store checkout getting a nice can of soup, but for some reason a bunch of heavy bottles are getting in the way! You can click and drag the bottles and can to move them, the bottles are a bit heavier so if there are any on the can it could weight it down. We only want a can in the basket so make sure no flying bottles land in there.

Shooting: The audacity of some people to be shooting cans during a nuclear fallout... Save those cans by using this neat sign you found to block the bullets, the sign will follow your cursor so just keep it in front of a can with a reticle on it to block the incoming bullet.

Coding & Art - Me

Music - The neighbor

A single art asset - you know who you are

Sound Effects - ZapSplat

Thanks!
